it.univpm.demoSpringBootApp

Class MigrantsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.univpm.demoSpringBootApp.MigrantsController

  • @RestController
public class MigrantsController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for Migrants, refers to the dataset created from the tsv file. Every statistic or filter is generated from a GET call.
    Author:
    Tommaso

      • getDataSet

        @GetMapping(value="/migrants")
public static java.util.List<MigrationStatus> getDataSet()

      • MigrantsFilter

        @GetMapping(value="/migrants/get")
public java.util.List<MigrationStatus> MigrantsFilter(@RequestParam(value="filter",defaultValue="",required=false)
                                                                                          java.lang.String filter)
        "/migrants/get?filter" this GET call is for use filters on the dataset, the syntax is the following: ?filter=FIRSTFIELD:(YEAR1):OPERATOR:VALUE:LINK("AND,OR"):SECONDFIELD:(YEAR2):OPERATOR:VALUE..
        Parameters:
        filter -
        Returns:
        filtered dataset

      • filterStats

        @GetMapping(value="/migrants/stats")
public java.util.List<java.util.Map> filterStats(@RequestParam(value="nameStats",defaultValue="",required=false)
                                                                                       java.lang.String nameStats,
                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="filter",defaultValue="",required=false)
                                                                                       java.lang.String filter)
                                                                                throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                                                                       java.lang.SecurityException,
                                                                                       java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                                                       java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                                                       java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        Get call that returns the statistics about the dataset, stats are generated also for filtered dataset. "/migrants/stats?nameStats="field/year"&filter=FIRSTFIELD:(YEAR1):OPERATOR:VALUE:LINK("AND,OR"):SECONDFIELD:(YEAR2):OPERATOR:VALUE.."
        Parameters:
        nameStats, - refering fields for statistics.
        filter, - filter string to parse and apply to the dataset
        Returns:
        Map of stats
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        java.lang.SecurityException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
